About Me

    Hey! My name is Bradley Caravana, I'm based out of Long Island, New York, and I'm currently studying computer programming and web development. In addition to devoting a great deal of my time to learning programming concepts, I've built a number of computers that are used for many different purposes, ranging from a complete workstation, to an email and web browsing machine; on my spare time, I take timelapses/photos with my GoPro Hero 5 camera.


    My goals with this website are to showcase my web development skills and to layout the work I've completed in my career thus far. I have experience working with SCSS (the styling for this portfolio is written in SCSS), CSS frameworks such as Bootstrap and Materialize, and frontend JavaScript.


    If you're interested in my work, get in touch with me using the contact form.
